meanings.definition: Any of the seven centers of spiritual power in the human body according to yoga philosophy.
meanings.sent1: In yoga, practitioners focus on balancing their chakras to enhance spiritual energy.
meanings.sent2: Meditation can help align the chakras and promote overall well-being.
meanings.sent3: The chakras in the body are like colorful energy hubs waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent4: Her chakras spun like vibrant wheels, illuminating her inner strength.
meanings.sent5: The teacher explained the chakras using a rainbow as a visual aid.

meanings.definition: A wheel-like energy center in the body, believed to be connected to physical, emotional, and spiritual well-being.
meanings.sent1: The chakras are thought to regulate various aspects of our health and emotions.
meanings.sent2: Yogis often work on unblocking their chakras through specific poses and breathing techniques.
meanings.sent3: His chakras seemed to have a mind of their own, influencing his mood swings.
meanings.sent4: The dancer moved gracefully, her chakras spinning in harmony with the music.
meanings.sent5: The healer's touch felt like a warm breeze flowing through the chakras.
